chrome.fontSettings

Top-Level Variables
fontSettings: ChromeFontSettings
Classes
ChromeFontSettings

Use the chrome.fontSettings API to manage Chrome's font settings.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeFontSettings fontSettings

Accessor for the chrome.fontSettings namespace.

Class ChromeFontSettings

Fields

onDefaultFontSizeChanged: Stream
onFontChanged: Stream
onMinimumFontSizeChanged: Stream
Getters and Setters

Fields

final Stream onDefaultFixedFontSizeChanged
final Stream onDefaultFontSizeChanged
final Stream onFontChanged

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onDefaultFixedFontSizeChanged

Fired when the default fixed font size setting changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onDefaultFontSizeChanged

Fired when the default font size setting changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onFontChanged

Fired when a font setting changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onMinimumFontSizeChanged

Fired when the minimum font size setting changes.

Methods

Future<dynamic> clearDefaultFixedFontSize(dynamic details)

Clears the default fixed font size set by this extension, if any.

details This parameter is currently unused.

Future<dynamic> clearDefaultFontSize(dynamic details)

Clears the default font size set by this extension, if any.

details This parameter is currently unused.

Future<dynamic> clearFont(dynamic details)

Clears the font set by this extension, if any.

Future<dynamic> clearMinimumFontSize(dynamic details)

Clears the minimum font size set by this extension, if any.

details This parameter is currently unused.

Future<dynamic> getDefaultFixedFontSize(dynamic details)

Gets the default size for fixed width fonts.

details This parameter is currently unused.

Future<dynamic> getDefaultFontSize(dynamic details)

Gets the default font size.

details This parameter is currently unused.

Future<dynamic> getFont(dynamic details)

Gets the font for a given script and generic font family.

Future<dynamic> getFontList()

Gets a list of fonts on the system.

Future<dynamic> getMinimumFontSize(dynamic details)

Gets the minimum font size.

details This parameter is currently unused.

Future<dynamic> setDefaultFixedFontSize(dynamic details)

Sets the default size for fixed width fonts.

Future<dynamic> setDefaultFontSize(dynamic details)

Sets the default font size.

Future<dynamic> setFont(dynamic details)

Sets the font for a given script and generic font family.

Future<dynamic> setMinimumFontSize(dynamic details)

Sets the minimum font size.
